text: Michel Berson (21 April 1945 – 8 April 2021) was a French politician. He was Mayor of Crosne, Essonne from 1977 until 1998. He was a Deputy from 1981 until 1997. Berson was a Senator from 2011 until 2017. Berson died on 8 April 2021, aged 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Île-de-France Category:People from Essonne
title: Michel Berson
